track.name: Ice Cream Man
comments: @BigChoupique - I still can't understand why you've commented on dozens of Waits songs claiming how he's repetitive, especially as you've commented on songs from Bone Machine and then songs from Closing Time, considering those albums are completely different.
I like this cut better than a lot of others, but still Waits gets kinda boring pretty quick. Not bad in small doses so you have a chance to forget how repetitive he is.
Slower than the Closing Time album version, still great nonetheless.
I love the way the piano becomes the ice-cream man's dingaladongaler at the end
this is one of the best albums to start your morning to
Vivid memories of my dad singing this.
This kick started my late morning.
o yeahhhhhhh, i fell it on my skin.
